projectCreation.title: Create New Project
projectCreation.description: Set up your construction project with BuildTrack Pro.

milestonesStep.title: Project Milestones
milestonesStep.description: Define key milestones for your project timeline.
milestonesStep.validationArray: Please add at least one item
milestonesStep.emptyMilestones: No milestones yet. Add your first milestone to get started.
milestonesStep.emptyTasks: No tasks yet for this milestone.
milestonesStep.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this milestone?
milestonesStep.confirmDeleteTask: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

budgetStep.title: Project Budget
budgetStep.description: Define and review your project budget.
budgetStep.budgetParametersDescription: Set the parameters for your budget recommendation.
budgetStep.expeditedTimelineTooltip: Increases budget to account for accelerated schedule (25% premium).
budgetStep.complexityFactorTooltip: Adjust based on project complexity: lower for simpler projects, higher for more complex ones.
budgetStep.budgetReviewDescription: Review and customize your generated budget recommendation.
budgetStep.validationSiteArea: Site area must be at least 100 square units
budgetStep.validationDuration: Duration must be at least 1 month
